name: HSBC LATIN AMERICA HOLDINGS (UK) LIMITED
sampleDescriptions: Enlisting US support for the rule of law in El Salvador as it impacts HSBCs interests in that country.
Enlisting US support for the rule of law in El Salvador as it impacts HSBCs interests in that country.
HSBC seeks U.S. government (State Department and Congress) awareness and influence regarding the denial of justice to HSBC by the government of El Salvador in a judicial dispute with a debtor.

In light of U.S. influence, programs, and policy interests in El Salvador and in Honduras, HSBC has informed U.S. government officials (including Congressional offices and the State Department) of the
